content: #18013 is a pretty straightforward generalization, but in addition also introduces aliases, adds three lemmas and golfs some proofs (by a lot). The net result is +97-84=+13 lines. I've also proposed to remove max₃ and coeq₃ that are no longer used so there are less to port :), and I'd oblige to do so if a maintainer agrees.
Thanks to Joël Riou and Riccardo Brasca!
Junyan Xu has marked this topic as resolved.
